title: Hawu Cultural Heritage
subtitle: The cultural wealth of Sabu Raijua that has been passed down through generations, reflecting the unique and authentic identity of the Hawu people.

tenun.title: Hawu Ikat Weaving
tenun.description: Traditional weaving craft with distinctive motifs known internationally. Each motif has deep philosophical meaning in Hawu culture.

dance.title: Ledo Hawu Dance
dance.description: Sacred dance believed to guide souls to eternal peace. This dance features sword-drawing movements with deep spiritual meaning.

language.title: Hawu Language
language.description: Regional language that remains vibrant and used in daily life of Sabu Raijua people. This language has unique vocabulary richness.

beach.title: White Sand Beaches
beach.description: Beauty of exotic beaches with fine white sand and crystal-clear seawater. Raemea Beach and beaches in Raijua Island are main attractions.

traditions.title: Traditions & Customary Ceremonies
traditions.subtitle: Various traditions and customary ceremonies still preserved as part of Sabu Raijua people's cultural identity.

jingi_tiu.name: Jingi Tiu
jingi_tiu.description: Traditional beliefs of Raijua people still preserved today

wara_tada.name: Wara Tada
wara_tada.description: Traditional dance depicting daily life of Hawu people

habba_koorai.name: Habba Koorai
habba_koorai.description: Customary ceremony performed in various important celebrations

pe_iu_manu.name: Pe Iu Manu
pe_iu_manu.description: Traditional ritual related to the life cycle of the community

raemea.title: Raemea Beach
raemea.description: Beach with unique colored cliffs and fine white sand, ideal for snorkeling and diving.

raijua.title: Raijua Island
raijua.description: Small island with pristine natural beauty and authentic traditional culture.

village.title: Traditional Tourism Village
village.description: Experience staying in homestays and witnessing the ikat weaving process firsthand.

culinary.title: Local Cuisine
culinary.description: Wolapa, budu, due, donahu, and various traditional cuisines with unique flavors.
